root.name: Endless Ocean: Blue World
root.description: OverviewEndless Ocean: Blue World is the sequel to the original Endless Ocean. It was released on February 22, 2010 in North America. As in the first game, the player takes control of a scuba diver and explorers various underwater locations in order to identify and interact with the ocean's wildlife, take pictures, and undertake quests.When not exploring the ocean depths, the player can check up on quest status and purchase new gear from the LL Diving Company's base on Nine Ball Island.Wii Speak BundleEndless Ocean: Blue World was bundled with the Wii Speak microphone accessory previously bundled with Animal Crossing: City Folk. Together, the game and microphone bundle cost only $30 at the game's release.PlotThe main quest line in Blue World sends the player around the world along with Jean-Eric Louvier and his granddaughter Oceana in search for clues that will lead them to the Song of Dragons.
